sub_title: Head Of Business Development | Food&Beverages, Technology and Industry | Netherlands and Belgium | GXO Logistics
summary:
Learnt on the field, sold and implemented mostly every type of Supply Chain & ecommerce services: air & sea freight, warehousing, packaging design, copacking, value-added services, LTL/FTL, intermodal transport, last mile delivery, control towers, repairs, webstores, payment gateway and even call centers!

Gathered together a vast network of contacts in the Supply Chain & ecommerce industries, from China to the US and all over Europe. Have access to Top Managers at shippers from very different industries, but also at global freight forwarders, logistics providers & shipping lines.

Went from a Europe Business Development Manager job position to Global Sales & Marketing VP one, Board member, reporting to the CEO, managing a team of 12 FTEs. Strong know-how in Supply Chain, e-commerce but also Strategy, Sales (hunting & farming), Marketing, Public Relations, Innovation, Recruitment, Management, Implementation, P&L ownership & optimization. 

Did rarely sell solutions of less than $1M, topping even $15M or $18M per win sometimes. Appointed and managed OKAM (Operational Key Account Managers) on some of these big wins, being in charge of the 150 to 200 FTEs, P&L, KPIs, new pricing, quality and Quarterly Business Reviews by their side.
